data.text: Ethiopian transported 300,000 doses of COVID 19 vaccines donated by China. High level Ethiopian government officials and representatives from the Chinese embassy in Addis Ababa received the vaccines that arrived at Addis Ababa Bole International Airport today. https://t.co/w2BghCy3Lr

data.text:
We have taken delivery of B737-800FS Converted Freighter Aircraft from GA Telesis. 
The freighter will enhance our capability to serve short-haul destinations to transport much-needed medical supplies and vaccines. https://t.co/9A4Sh5JTpz

A year since our first Preighter operation, we have operated 5,645 Cargo flights on the cabin of passenger aircraft and transported more than 121,750 tons of cargo across our vast global network. https://t.co/bb0fgECxSo

“Today marks one year since the beginning of our first Preighter flight service as a way to manage the unprecedented global crisis." 

“Ethiopian Group CEO, Mr. Tewolde  GebreMariam https://t.co/ss8vqnyjsh
@ChiamakaOsuagwu Dear  @ChiamakaOsuagwu, Thank  you for contacting us. Kindly DM us your ticket number and email address.

We mark 1 year since the first Preighter operation on passenger aircraft.
On this day last year, we operated our first cargo only service on a passenger aircraft with Boeing B787-900. The flight departed on 25 March 2020 from Addis Ababa to Kinshasa. 
https://t.co/e0P2OPnEwt https://t.co/OO2y4Jrc7b

data.text: Follow that smile! #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/IswVnvijYO

Ethiopian Airlines is pleased to announce its new reduced fares for flights departing from Kuwait. 10 days of Promotion!!! 15% off on selective destinations!!! To get more information or to book your flights click on the link below
https://t.co/Ut4ZLg0KfU
 #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/uHE6m3xqMB
Ethiopian offers you comfort and care on your journey to your dream destination. #EthiopianAirlines  #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/M974J8aStQ

Ethiopian Airlines has been short listed in 2 categories for an award at World Air Cargo Awards 2021 to be held t on 5th May 2021.

Vote for us on the two categories we are listed on by clicking on this link: 
https://t.co/Sqf136OIfG

Voting ends on Friday 26th March 2021. https://t.co/d030Iv2YzF

“The Engine Is The Heart Of An Airplane But The Pilot Is Its Soul.”
Walter Alexander Raleigh
#EthiopianAirlines #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/dFG3bArcDd

Ethiopian Airlines grew extremely quickly between 2011 and 2019, with the full-service carrier more than doubling in size. It added nearly 15 million seats – over five million more than all of the others in the top-10 combined.
https://t.co/SW8LFgx1TL @simple_flying https://t.co/oRoVWcERO1

The importance of good sites for overseas offices, like this in Aden was appreciated more and more as the airline’s international network grew. In the early 1950’s 
#ThrowbackThursday #FlyEthopian https://t.co/DWM6bd2lU2

data.text:
Happy International Women's Day! 
#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/2z8NCOo2HG

We have transported and delivered the first batch of COVID-19 Vaccines to Ethiopia. The shipment has arrived today and delivered to the Ethiopian MoH in a ceremony held in our cargo terminal. We will keep on providing this mission-critical service to save lives. #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/yx3XtNq0JR
RT @WHOEthiopia: Landmark Event! #Ethiopia🇪🇹 has received the #AstraZeneca #COVID19 vaccine via #COVAX. This is a big step towards ensuring…

Ready for the next adventure! Where will yours take you? Let us know in the comments down below.
#Adventure #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/zUKH1w2YnO

Spreading our wings towards new successes, just like before.

urls.title: Extra baggage
urls.description: You aren' t registered yet? Join the program for free and start enjoying the benefits for flights made 90 days back. Excess and Special Baggage Purchase additional baggage at ethiopianairlines.com. You can also purchase it from Ethiopian ticketing offices, Ethiopian Global Contact Center, Ethiopian agents and Ethiopian Airport. If you have already booked a flight with Ethiopian, you can purchase your excess baggage using MANAGE BOOKING Ethiopian Airlines Baggage Policy for Excess baggage rate. Learn

data.text: Ethiopian Airlines is a good instance for firm-level technological learning and catch up. It has evolved from a small domestic airline into a fully integrated and technologically advanced 21st-century company. From the book: HOW NATIONS LEARN (OUP).  https://t.co/eFews4Qf0n https://t.co/Ij2gwu3nAh
